data.name: Whooper
data.description: Look who's here - THE burger to rule them all. A real meaty flame-grilled Whopper® beef patty, topped with tangy pickles, ketchup, fresh tomatoes, crisp lettuce and fresh onions, finished with creamy mayo , and served on a toasted 5 sesame seed bun. Feeling hungry for a real meaty burger yet?

data.name: Whopper with Cheese
data.description: What else can we say, all the great taste of the WHOPPER® with cheese. A truly cheesillicious WHOPPIN' Time.

data.name: Whooper Jr
data.description: Look who's here - THE burger to rule them all. A real meaty flame-grilled Whopper® beef patty, topped with tangy pickles, ketchup, fresh tomatoes, crisp lettuce and fresh onions, finished with creamy mayo , and served on a toasted 5 sesame seed bun. Feeling hungry for a real meaty burger yet?

data.name: Single BBQ Beefacon
data.description: Always the right choice with our Single BBQ Beefacon. Our signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with Beefacon , cheese and our special smokey BBQ sauce all in a toasted sesame seed bun. One of life’s simple pleasures.

data.name: Double BBQ Beefacon
data.description: Double it up. Double the taste! Grab hold of our Double BBQ Beefacon with cheese slices, Beefacon and delicious smokey BBQ sauce to complete the sensational taste.

data.name: Single Mushroom Swiss
data.description: A creation like no other! Creamy subtle taste of mushroom and melted swiss cheese with perfectly grilled beef patties served with soft sesame buns. Mush-room for your tummy to be filled!

data.name: Double Mushroom Swiss
data.description: Can't get enough of that heavenly creamy taste? Go for double the goodness! Melted Swiss cheese on two flame-grilled beef patties, topped with BK's special mushroom sauce, served on a sesame seed bun. Twice the velvety goodness in every bite.

data.name: Cheeseburger
data.description: You can’t go wrong with our cheeseburger, a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a simple layer of melted American cheese, crinkle cut pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

data.name: Double Cheeseburger
data.description: Make room for our Double Cheeseburger, two signature flame-grilled beef patties topped with a simple layer of melted American cheese, crinkle cut pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun

data.name: BK Chick'N Crisp
data.description: Some call it 'Chicken Crisp'. Others call it 'Chick and Crisp'. Whatever you call it, you’ll get a yummyliciously crispy chicken fillet topped with garden-fresh lettuce and creamy mayo, served on a sesame seed bun. The fusion of textures, tastes and aromas is a winner — ‘N there’s no doubt about that.

data.name: Spicy Tendercrisp
data.description: Like your chicken crispy, or tender? Why not both? The Tendercrisp™ patty - made from chicken thigh to be crispy outside and tender inside - is topped with a tomato slice, freshly shredded lettuce and creamy mayo, then served on a fragrant sesame seed bun. Perfect for those who want the best of both worlds

data.name: Tendergrill
data.description: Wonder why it’s called Tendergrill™? That’s ‘cos we made sure to flame-grill the chicken thighs to soft, juicy perfection. Best enjoyed with fries and soft drink.

data.name: French Chicken
data.description: Bonjour! The beauty that was created for an everlasting love. Crispy long chicken patty with a combination of chicken strips, melted Swiss cheese and creamy mayo sandwiched between two long sesame seed buns. A definite top favourite!

data.name: Fish'N Crisp
data.description: Score a catch of marvelous flavors of your tastebuds with this delightful burger. A succulent fish fillet is embraced by a whole slice of American cheese, and then topped with tangy tartar sauce to accentuate the fish's flavor and it's all served between a toasted sesame bun.

data.name: Mushroom Veggie Burger
data.description: Here's an option for our Veggie-loving friends! Our Mushroom Veggie Burger features our famous chunky mushroom in special sauce combination that compliments the burger so well, it's like a party in your mouth.

data.name: Salad
data.description: Something light on the tummy but super packed with great nutrients. Come enjoy our salad bowl with special sauce on its own or swap it with fries when you order your next BK meal!

data.name: Cheesy Caramelized Onion Croissan'wich
data.description: Kickstart the day with a sweet and savoury masterpiece! Our Cheesy Caramelized Onion Croissan'wich® is perfect for cheese lovers, and great for satisfying that morning hunger.

data.name: Chicken Strips Croissan'wich
data.description: This sensational chicken strips, egg and cheese sauce sandwiched between soft buttery CROISSAN’WICH® is sure to tantalize your taste buds.

data.name: Beefacon Croissan'wich
data.description: This signature combination of creamy mayo, Beefacon®, fluffy eggs and American cheese sandwiched between a CROISSAN’WICH® bun is sure to hit all the right spots if you’re looking for a savoury pick-me-up.

data.name: Onion Rings
data.description: There's more to sides than fries. Just ask fans of our famous Onion Rings, bursting with refreshing onion goodness inside! Perfect snack on its own or with a meal.

data.name: 6 Pcs Nuggets
data.description: Are all chicken nuggets the same? Only if they‘re made with the same love as BK Nuggets are. They‘re crispier. They‘re juicier. They‘re tastier. Hungry yet?

data.name: French Fries
data.description: Yummy shoe-string fires fried to a crisp golden brown, served piping hot withyour favourite Value Meal, or as the star of the moment.

data.name: Apple Pie
data.description: Sweet Apple chunks in a crispy pie crust. It'll win you over in a bite! Perfect after meals

data.name: HERSHEY’S Sundae Pie
data.description: Say hello to our HERSHEY’S Sundae Pie. One part crunchy chocolate crust and one part chocolate crème filling, garnished with a delicious topping of fudge drizzle and real HERSHEY’S Chocolate Chips. The HERSHEY’S trademark and trade dress are used under license by Burger King Corporation.

data.name: Cold Soft Drink
data.description: Great selection of drinks to be consumed with or without straw. Your favourite drinks only @ BK. Choose your pleasure.

data.name: Mineral Water
data.description: Cool down with our Mineral water, it sure does quench your thirst!

data.name: Americano
data.description: Espresso combined with water. Same strength as drip coffee, but a different flavor. Try it!. Hot & Iced Americano are available.

data.name: Latte
data.description: Makes mornings worth waking up for. Espresso and milk. Hot & Iced Latte are available.

data.name: Mocha
data.description: If coffee ain’t hip enough, try this combination of chocolate and espresso. Hot & Iced Mocha are available

data.name: Cappuccino
data.description: An Italian classic prepared with espresso, hot milk and steamed milk foam.
